description: Returns information about a provisioning template version. Requires permission to access the DescribeProvisioningTemplateVersion action.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date when the provisioning template version was created.

nested_items.name: templateBody
nested_items.description: The JSON formatted contents of the provisioning template version.

nested_items.name: isDefaultVersion
nested_items.description: True if the provisioning template version is the default version.
